
### address splitting for TLBs (1)  {.smaller}


* my desktop:
* 4KB ($2^12$ byte) pages; 48-bit virtual address
* 64-entry, 4-way L1 data TLB 
<hr class="vspace" />
* TLB index bits? \\iftoggle{heldback 

   * $64/4 = 16$ sets --- 4 bits
 }
* TLB tag bits? \\iftoggle{heldback 

   * $48-12=36$ bit virtual page number ---  $36-4=32$ bit TLB tag
 }
